jcuda.jcusolver

Class JCusolverRf

  • java.lang.Object
    • jcuda.jcusolver.JCusolverRf

  • public class JCusolverRf
extends java.lang.Object
    Java bindings for CUSOLVER, the NVIDIA CUDA solver library.

    The documentation is taken from the CUSOLVER header files.
